nodes.text: The Flimmel tree was a species of carnivorous plant native to Xagobah that resembled a cross between a mushroom and a spider. They were part of a large colony that shared a common root system, with the entire plant living many millennia.
Boba Fett was almost consumed by a Flimmel tree when he came to Xagobah in search of Wat Tambor. He managed to escape by stunning the plant with a Stokhli spray stick.
